name: Smart Farm Token
description: Smart farm is an interesting blockchain game based on money security smart chain BSC, which adopts a completely decentralized operation mode. The game simulates the farm scene and integrates the new playing method of metauniverse + defi + NFT. Users can obtain relevant asset income through experience farming and farm management. While ensuring entertainment, games also pay attention to social development. In the middle and later stages of the project development, smart farm will gradually transition to smart planet and finally build into a smart universe.
